argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | unitsubm.1 | |- U = ( Unit ` R ) |
| 2 |  | unitsubm.2 | |- M = ( mulGrp ` R ) |
| 3 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 | 3, 1 | #P_unitss | |- U C_ ( Base ` R ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_a1i | |- ( R e. Ring -> U C_ ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 1r ` R ) |
| 7 | 1, 6 | #P_1unit | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( 1r ` R ) e. U ) |
| 8 | 2 | #P_oveq1i | |- ( M |`s U ) = ( ( mulGrp ` R ) |`s U ) |
| 9 | 1, 8 | #P_unitgrp | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( M |`s U ) e. Grp ) |
| 10 |  | #P_grpmnd | |- ( ( M |`s U ) e. Grp -> ( M |`s U ) e. Mnd ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( M |`s U ) e. Mnd ) |
| 12 | 2 | #P_ringmgp | |- ( R e. Ring -> M e. Mnd ) |
| 13 | 2, 3 | #P_mgpbas | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` M ) |
| 14 | 2, 6 | #P_ringidval | |- ( 1r ` R ) = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 15 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( M |`s U ) = ( M |`s U ) |
| 16 | 13, 14, 15 | #P_issubm2 | |- ( M e. Mnd -> ( U e. ( SubMnd ` M ) <-> ( U C_ ( Base ` R ) /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. U /\ ( M |`s U ) e. Mnd ) ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 16 | #P_syl | |- ( R e. Ring -> ( U e. ( SubMnd ` M ) <-> ( U C_ ( Base ` R ) /\ ( 1r ` R ) e. U /\ ( M |`s U ) e. Mnd ) ) ) |
| 18 | 5, 7, 11, 17 | #P_mpbir3and | |- ( R e. Ring -> U e. ( SubMnd ` M ) ) |
